subject: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for verification of Service Level Agreement (SLA) in respect of Ambulances Deployed through Centralised Agencies through Datalake portal of NHAl -reg.
text: MRdy 75h4 RTTHNf qfeabrot (Tsw5 4Rdev &r RTTHNf 4ART4, MRG TRTT) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) T7a Tn 5fl-5 Qa 6, Tac7-10, aa, 75 @oait 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 TMI/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Incident Management /2024 Policy Circular No.18.96/2024 dated 30th July _ 2024 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/HO/ AmbulancePolicy/2020 (Comp. No. 30884)} Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for verification of Service Level Agreement (SLA) in respect of Ambulances Deployed through Centralised Agencies through Datalake portal of NHAI -reg: The procurement process for the deployment of Basic Life Support (BLS) Ambulances in two Phases i.e. Phase-I and Phase-II had been completed by NHAI HQ: For this purpose, Four Zones have been created in the Country and accordingly the works have been awarded through 8 Contract Agreements as per the details below: ROs included Zone Phase Ambulance Deployment Agencies Date of Agreement in Zone Chandigarh Dehradun Phase-| M/s. Ziqitza Healthcare Ltd. 07.04.2021 UP East Zone-1 UP west Jammu M/s. Asian Scientific Industries in Shimla Phase-II JV with J.K. Ambulance Services 04.10.2022 Delhi Bhopal/ Ms. S.P. Automotive in JV with Jabalpur Phase-| UnM Lifecare Pvt. Ltd. 04.07.2021 Jaipur Zone-2 Gujarat Mumbai Phase-II M/s. Ziqitza Healthcare Ltd. 04.10.2022 Nagpur Guwahati M/s. UnM Lifecare Pvt. Ltd. in JV Patna Phase-| 07.04.2021 with Shree Sairaj Buildcon Ranchi Zone-3 Odisha Raipur Phase-II M/s. Ziqitza Healthcare Ltd: 24.02.2023 Kolkata Hyderabad M/s. Shreenija Travels in JV with Vijayawada Phase-| 07.04.2021 UnM Lifecare Pvt . Ltd. Madurai Zone-4 Chennai Kerala Phase-II M/s: Bavya Health Services Private 06.10.2022 Limited Bangalore 2 _ The Project is currently in implementation stage and based on the challenges faced so the following Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) for Mobilization/  Demobilization, physical inspection of Ambulance and SLA verification through NHAI Datalake is to be followed by all Field Units and NHAI HQ: Contd__2I - M1 { 7 9 NHAL far,
